email_content:
Hi Angela,

I wanted to give you a brief snapshot of how the Zenith Wellness Initiative is progressing.

Participation & Engagement
• Overall enrollment is 78% of our workforce (up from 74% last month).
• Average weekly gym-check-ins have risen 12% since March.
• The two most-attended resources are the nutritional meal-planning app (61% active users) and the stress-management workshops (avg. 35 employees / session).

Early Outcomes
• Employees who attend at least one wellness activity per week report a 15-point increase in self-rated energy levels (pulse survey, April).
• Sick-day usage in Q1 dropped by 6% compared with the same period last year. While it’s early, HR believes wellness participation is a contributing factor.

What’s Next (May–June)
• Launching a 4-week “Spring Step-Up” challenge on 20 May – goal is 100 million collective steps.
• Introducing two 15-minute guided mindfulness breaks that managers can slot into team calendars.
• Circulating a short feedback survey in mid-June to gather ideas for Q3 programming.

I’ll keep tracking the data and will share a more detailed metrics dashboard after the step challenge concludes. Please let me know if you’d like any additional information or if there are particular KPIs you’d like highlighted in future reports.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Employee Wellness Coordinator
